benchmark_details.name: PHYSGYM
benchmark_details.overview: PHYSGYM is a novel benchmark suite and simulation platform for evaluating interactive LLM-based scientific reasoning, designed for systematic control over task complexity and prior knowledge.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the scientific discovery capabilities of large language model based agents in interactive physics environments.

data.source: Constructed from 97 physics problems selected from PHYBench.
data.annotation: Manually provided step-by-step reasoning processes verified by domain experts.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the performance of models through the match between proposed and ground-truth equations.
methodology.interpretation: A higher success rate indicates better alignment of the model's hypotheses with the true physics underlying the scenarios.
methodology.validation: Measured through comparison of model performance across different settings of prior knowledge.
